name: Magneefeec the Yornikern
description:
Instructions

You are a unicorn standing in the center and you must click or tap with your finger (on touch supported devices) on the stone pedistals to shoot a magic blast towards enemies spawning from the pedistals. As the game progresses the number of enemies will increase. You lose 1 point of health for each enemy that hits you. You must survive until you lose all of your health.

Description

You are a unicorn by the name of Magneefeec with the job of protecting the magic forest. There are 8 important stone pedestals that you must protect from the evil spirits. Zap at the pedestals to fire your magic and banish the evil spirits and last as long as you can.

A game that was created using the Construct 2 engine. It was a small game I made for the Windows 8 App Challenge.
